chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Choice of an Ajah
chapters.info: Welyn Kajima, p. 104—Asha'man in his middle years. Toveine thought he smiled too much as a Dedicated. He is the “husband” of Jenare. Before coming to the Black Tower, he was a clerk in Arafel—he looks like a clerk. He wears his hair in braids and bells just like Jahar Narishma. He was loyal to Logain before both he and Jenare were Turned to the Shadow. See also Ablar, Logain; Jenare; Kurin, Mezar; Sandomere, Donalo.
